definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dub. (if correct, Aram. form (cf. [[עוּק]], 0oq) for [[חוּק]] press, so Thes al.);—only

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תָּעִיק]] Am 2:13, Pt. [[מֵעִיק]] v:Am 2:13; but read prob. [[תָּפוּק]], [[מֵפִיק]] totter, cause tottering Hi We Now Dr.
